item.title: 'I don't like investing in black boxes.' Why tech investor Dan Niles doesn't like Trump push for fewer corporate reports
item.description: Dan Niles rejected President Trump's pitch to reduce financial reporting requirements for public companies in an interview with CNBC on Monday.

item.title: Tesla gain likely to continue, along with the up-move in this other EV play, according to Katie Stockton
item.description: The chart analyst looks at the charts on Tesla and NIO.

item.title: Deutsche Bank raises Micron price target ahead of earnings next week
item.description: Deutsche Bank sees shares of Micron rising 11% from here.

item.title: Best Stocks: A health care giant on our list is 'building a base' to go sharply higher
item.description: Josh Brown and Sean Russo break down this stock that could be ready to rip higher.

item.title: Citi upgrades Union Pacific as railroad stock looks 'too compelling to ignore'
item.description: Citi analyst Ariel Rosa cited more clarity around Union Pacific's merger with Norfolk Southern as a major catalyst for the stock.
